comments:
This exception was thrown when deleting a project and allowing it to run in the background.  While the deletion was taking place I closed an editor that happened to be on one of the files that was to be deleted.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.workbench 4 0 2006-10-16 15:57:20.329
!MESSAGE WARNING: Blocked recursive attempt to close part org.eclipse.jdt.ui.CompilationUnitEditor while still in the middle of activating it
!STACK 0
